name: Evolucion Medica
description: Generic web page for Evolucion Medica project under Rocking supervision, it allows to connect to different URLs and generate a web page for EV's clients. Made using React, CSS, and TypeScript.

name: Stock Managment App
description: Repository for the Retamozo Provisioning management system. It allows control of stock through barcode and also it keeps clients tabs. Made with Next.js, Tailwind, Java, and Spring.

name: Compound Interest Rate Calculator
description: Small web app for calculating the compound interest rate gained for a predetermined set of time. Made with Next.js, Tailwind, and TypeScript

name: Secret Friend
description: A simple application developed under the Oracle Next Education program, for organizing secret friend draws among friends. Made with just HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

name: Digital Booking
description: Repository for the final integration project of Digital House. Made with React, CSS, JavaScript, Java, Spring, and MySQL.

name: Old Portfolio
description: My old portfolio. Made with Next.js, and Tailwind.

name: Angular ToDo App
description: Small ToDo web app using Angular 20 and TypeScript.
